article_html: On Tuesday afternoon a fuel tanker truck overturned on the New Jersey turnpike and caught fire, delaying traffic for hours. The condition of the driver, who was airlifted to a hospital, is unknown
text: On Tuesday afternoon a fuel tanker truck overturned on the New Jersey turnpike and caught fire, delaying traffic for hours. The condition of the driver, who was airlifted to a hospital, is unknown
title: Fuel tanker truck overturns on New Jersey Turnpike - video
